project_descr: The overall objective of the project is to enhance approximation of the migration and border management in Armenia to the European standards of governance

outputs.output_descr: The project is aimed at strengthening inter-agency cooperation with a focus on the simplification and harmonisation of procedures; improving the service level for end users; facilitating trade; and further developing transport corridors.
donor_name: INTERNATIONAL CENTER FOR MIGRATION POLICY DEVELOPMENT

document_name: Procurement of Voter Authentication Devices and software UNDP/PSU ITB 500187-1
RFP 034/17 - Consultancy Services for the Preparation of Detailed Design and Tender Documentation for Modernization of the Meghri Border Crossing Point in the Republic of Armenia
RFQ 079/17-Preparation of the Environmental and Social Impact Assessment (ESIA) Study for the MIBMA Project
Services on the use of Information Technologies for Improving the Accountability and Transparency of Border Services
project_title: support to migration and border management in armenia
